meanings.definition: A person who plays the organ.
meanings.sent1: The church hired talented organists for the Sunday service.
meanings.sent2: The organists performed beautifully at the concert last night.
meanings.sent3: The organists had a friendly competition to see who could play the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, organists are the heartbeats of harmony.
meanings.sent5: The organists' fingers danced across the keys, creating magical melodies.
